title: iRobot Braava™ - How to Attach Cloth to Reservoir Pad
description: iRobot Braava - How to Attach Cloth to Reservoir Pad

asset.author: iRobot
asset.hookText: iRobot Braava™ - How to Attach Cloth to Reservoir Pad

transcripts: The pro clean reservoir pad dispenses liquid as Braava mops to keep the cleaning cloth wet longer to fill the reservoir open the fill cap by pulling and swiveling it to the side. Fill the reservoir over a sink as a small amount of fluid can leak out when the cap is closed. Fill reservoir with water or mild cleaning solution and replace fill cap. Pressing it in securely so it does not leak. Dampen the blue pro clean microfiber cloth, and press on to the Velcro strips. Do not use a dry cloth. Attach the reservoir pad to Braava, magnets will help it snap into place.
